title: Smart Home + Industrial Automation in one stack
subtitle: Built for homeowners, makers, and facility managers who need secure IoT orchestration across Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and wired networks.

panels.title: Multi-Protocol
panels.description: Supports Arduino, ESP32, ESP8266, BLE, Wi-Fi, MQTT, and Modbus.

panels.title: Integrations
panels.description: Works with Google Home, Alexa, Home Assistant, and custom dashboards.

panels.title: App Version
panels.description: Version 1.1.1 ¬∑ Updated 05 Jun 2025 with new energy insights.

panels.title: Robotics & Industrial
panels.description: Deploy collaborative robotics, conveyor controls, and telemetry hubs.
